attributes.action: To have Indefinite DLA awards automatically awarded PIP equivalent unhindered
attributes.background: Many deserving of DLA which has been recommended and supported by consultants and specialists are being overturned by 'boxtickers' without adequate medical training or background Not only would this prevent undue stress all the appeals waste tax-payers money so would save the Government untold sums.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/218952
